persistence

Class PluginManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • persistence.PluginManager

  • public class PluginManager
extends Object
    This is called from the server.java and takes a parameter as to which persistence model to use. It then parses the config file and creates a new instance of the appropriate storage persistence class.
    Author:
    scottdaly

      • parseConfig

        public void parseConfig(String configFile)
        Parses the config file based on the persistence type. Parse file will contain the following information: path, name of plugin, name of plugin class
        Parameters:
        persistanceType - that is specified from the command line.
